name: Summonsters
description:
Summon creatures and combine powerful artifacts to defeat bosses!

Combining three of the same summons will upgrade them to a higher star rating.
Summons with a 3-star rating possess unique special effects.
Utilize these effects to craft your own strategic combination of summons.
Leverage the 3-star effects of all 21 summon types to adapt to various situations!

Combine artifacts following specific recipes to create Epic and Legendary grade artifacts.
Combine 2 to 3 artifacts of Common, Uncommon, or Rare grade to create a higher-grade artifact.
Combining three higher-grade artifacts will yield a Legendary artifact.
Discover more than 107 artifacts, 44 recipes, and 8 Legendary artifacts!

Defeat three bosses and eleven types of elites.
Defeat the boss appearing every 10 minutes and the elites that emerge at various locations on the map to acquire significant amounts of gold and artifacts.
The final boss appears at the 30-minute mark. Good luck!

Tips
Leveling up in the store increases the player's health and movement speed, and introduces higher-priced summons.
Additionally, the maximum number of summons you can have will increase, and you'll be able to select an artifact of your choice.
Find and eliminate elites on the map as quickly as possible to grow stronger!
